name: Infinite Note Guessing Game
description:
Sharpen your sight reading skills with this supercharged music note quiz!

Identify the correct keys for musical notation arranged on the bass and treble clef to scatter jewels! Correct answers juice up your level meter, while incorrect clicks release flies that kamikaze explode your uncollected jewels. 
Use jewels to power up the quiz with robotic helper upgrades, a multiplier, and a bug zapper through infinite levels. 

A professor from the Music Motherboard in Intergalactic Music Adventure will guide you if you get stuck, with helpful clues breaking down the note features and placement, and hints on how to remember them  

Daily practice for young piano and music students: 10 gems.
